comments.raw_text:
1) Visit http://join.mozilla.org/thankyou.en.html
2) Fill "Pavel Cvrček" under "Please enter your name as you would like it to appear on your Mozilla Supporter card."
2) Click on button "Print my card".

Wrong result:    "PAVEL CVR?EK"
Expected result: "PAVEL CVRČEK"
comments.author: pcvrcek@mozilla.cz
comments.creator: pcvrcek@mozilla.cz
